name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Principal Software Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in full-stack development. Proficient in key technologies such as **.NET 8**, **C#**, **Entity Framework Core**, and **Azure** cloud services, including **Azure App Services**, **Azure Functions**, **Azure Service Bus**, and **Azure Storage**. Expertise in building robust **RESTful APIs** and implementing **microservices** and **event-driven architectures** for scalable applications.

Demonstrated ability in performance tuning, **CI/CD** automation, and leveraging **Docker** for containerization, ensuring high-quality deliverables in fast-paced environments. Skilled in **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform** and employing agile methodologies to streamline development processes with a strong commitment to **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** and **CQRS patterns**. 

In addition to my technical proficiency, I bring a comprehensive background in implementing solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors, with a focus on compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. My rich experience in **AI/ML capabilities** and hands-on work with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** complements my full-stack development expertise, allowing me to contribute effectively to innovative projects.
